name: Henry’s House (State of the Art)
overview: Published in F1 Licenceware CD-Rom Volume One F1-001 To F1-100, this AMOS based platfomer by State of the Art was released in 1995. Game came with source code included on disk1. As Henry, you have been ordered to collect all of your toys which are scattered in various rooms of the house. If you cannot, no allowance\pocket money for you! To select a level, guide Henry to a door then press fire to open it. Each level has a time limit, collect all the items within this time limit and a secret entrance will open.
